item.title: Project Translator VSCode Extension for Project Multilingual Localization
item.author: https://blog.jqknono.com (jqknono)
item.description: Project Translator is a powerful VSCode extension that leverages AI to achieve project-level multilingual automatic translation, efficiently completing document localization while maintaining code structure integrity.
